article: The word "sandwich" is an English word. Sandwich was an English  _  . He lived in England about two hundred years ago. Sandwich had a lot of  _  . He was very rich . But he liked  _  cards for money. He often played  _  day and night.  _  day he played for twenty-four hours without stopping. He did not  _  the card table to eat. He asked his man to  _  him some meat and  _  . So he put some meat between two pieces of bread. He did not want to stop  _  playing cards. From the name of this man, Sandwich, we have the word "sandwich"  today  .
